list_definition.definition: the place where passengers show travel documents at an airport or seaport
the process of checking in at an airport etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The opening and closing times for check-in and boarding can vary by airport.

list_definition.definition: to register at a hotel as a guest or at an airport as a passenger
